column2: "Na atowgyefo nye ndzebɔnyɛfo nyina twee piinii dɛ woribetsie no."
"Na Farisiifo nye mbrakyerɛfo no so hwinhwiin dɛ
"Dɛm ntsi Jesus buu hɔn bɛ yi dɛ
column4: "Hom mu nyimpa bɛn na sɛ ɔwɔ nguantsen ɔha
column5: na hɔn mu kor kɛyew a
column6: onnkegyaa eduokron akron no wɔ sar do
column7: na ɔnnka dza ayew no do nnkodu dɛ obohu no?"

column2: "Na sɛ ohu no a
column3: ɔdze no to ne batsir do

column2: "Na sɛ ɔba fie a
column3: ɔfrɛfrɛ n’anyɛnkofo nye no sɔnmufo boa ano
column6: na mehu mo guan a ɔyewee no."

column2: "Mese hom dɛ
column3: Dɛmara na dɛw bɛba ɔsor wɔ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi baako a onu noho
column4: sen atseneneefo eduokron akron a wonnhia nnuho no."

column2: "Anaaso ɔbaa bɛn na ɔwɔ sika ndwetɛbona du na sɛ no mu kor yew a
column5: na ɔnnhwehwɛ no yie ara nnkodu dɛ obohu?"

column2: "Na sɛ ohu a
column3: ɔfrɛfrɛ n’anyɛnkofo nye no sɔnmufo boa ano se dɛ
column5: na mehu dwetɛbona a ɔyewee no."

column2: "Mese hom dɛ
column3: Dɛmara na dɛw ba Nyankopɔn abɔfoe enyim wɔ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi baako a onu noho no ho."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
"na hɔn mu kakraba no see n’egya dɛ
column4: fa w’ahodze mu kyɛpɛn a ɔbɛyɛ medze no ma me. Na ɔkyɛɛ n’egyapadze mu maa hɔn."

column2: "Na enndzi da biara na ɔba kakraba no boaboaa ne nyina ano
column3: na ɔdɔɔ mu kɔr asaase bi do ekyirekyir; hɔ na ɔkɔbɔɔ asakasakabra sɛɛ n’ahodze nyina."

column2: "Na ɔhweer ne nyina wiei no
column3: ɔkɔm kɛse bi baa asaase no do

column2: "Na ɔkɔree dze noho kɔbɔɔ asaase no do nkorɔfo no mu bi ho; na ɔsomaa no ma ɔkɔr ne hamu kɛnyɛɛn mpreko."
"Na no kɔn dɔɔ dɛ ɔdze eduwahon a mpreko dzi no bi hyɛ ne yafun ma; naaso obiara amma no."
"Na n’enyi baa noho do no
column4: Apaafo ahen na m’egya wɔ a wɔwɔ edziban dzi ma ɔbor do
column5: na emi ɔkɔm ruku me yi?"

column2: "Mobɔsoɛr
column6: mayɛ bɔn etsia ɔsor nye w’enyim
column8: "na memmfata dɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio: na yɛ me dɛ w’apaafo no mu baako."

column2: "Na ɔsoɛree baa n’egya nkyɛn. Na ɔda ho wɔ ekyirekyir no
column5: na otuu mbirika kɛbaar no kɔn

column2: "Na ɔba no see no dɛ
column4: mayɛ bɔn etsia ɔsor nye w’enyim
column5: na memmfata dɛ wɔfrɛ me wo ba bio."

column2: "Na n’egya no see no nkowaa dɛ
column3: Hom nyɛ ntsɛm mfa atar pa mbra mbɛhyɛ no
column4: na hom mfa mpɛtsea nhyɛ ne nsa

column2: "na hom mfa nantwiba a ɔadɔ seradze no mbra mboku no
column8: na woehu no. Na wɔhyɛɛ ase maa hɔn enyi gyee."

column2: "Nna ne ba panyin no wɔ hamu: na ɔreba na ɔbɛɛn fie no
"Na ɔfrɛɛ nkowaa no baako bisaa no dza ɔrokɔ do."
"Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: na w’egya eku nantwiba a ɔadɔ seradze no
column5: osiandɛ ne nsa aka no nkwahosan mu."

column2: "Na no bo fuwii
column3: na ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔkɔ fie; na n’egya puei bɔtotɔe serɛɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔno dze
column5: mfe pii yi na masom wo
column6: eso mommfoom wo mbra do da; naaso emi dze
column7: emmaa me apɔnkyeba mpo dɛ menye m’anyɛnkofo mfa nngye hɛn enyiwa da;"

column2: "na wo ba yi a ɔnye ndwaman edzi w’ahodze yi bae no dze
column3: eku nantwiba a ɔadɔ seradze no ama no."

column2: "Na n’egya see no dɛ
column5: na dza mowɔ nyina yɛ wodze."

column2: "Na ɔsɛ dɛ hɛn ho tɔ hɛn
column3: na yedzi dɛw: osiandɛ wo nua yi
